item.magic-mod.magic_wand.tooltip: A basic catalyst for crafting otherworldly spells.
item.magic-mod.nature_wand.tooltip: Invoke spells that bend flora to your will.
item.magic-mod.ice_wand.tooltip: Channel the power of snow and frost.
item.magic-mod.fire_wand.tooltip: Conjure flames and scorching trails in your wake.
